The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
Android is an OS based on kernel linux.
Android is a closed source platform.
Android is not a purpose-built platform for mobile devices.
If the platform is open source, the developer doesnt have access to the source code.
An array is a container object that holds a fixed number of values of a specific type.
A developer must put the network calling in a separate thread that runs in background.
AsyncTask is an Android mechanism created to help handle short operations that need to report to the UI thread.
An activity is usually a single screen that the user sees on the device at one time.
An application typically has 0 activities.
The intents trigger an activity to start up.
An intent must be explicit.
The services never run in the background and dont have any user interface components.
A service can perform the same actions as activities.
An Android application is a loose collection of activities, services, content providers, and broadcast receivers..
